name: Super Bomb Ball
description:
Defuse or lose!

Super Bomb Ball is a re-imagining of the Super Monkey Ball franchise, where the main goal is to roll the bomb to the water door to defuse it before it explodes!

=====================================================
Features

  • Roll to survive!
    • The bomb will start with the fuse lit, keep rolling it by rotating the platform to make it reach the goal and defuse it on time!
  • Fuse it to avoid exploding early!
    • There are fuses scattered around the level, grab them to increase your time before exploding!
  • Evade obstacles!
    • Bumpers and fireballs are placed around the level to prevent you from reaching the goal and make you lose instantly!
